column4: hey, does anyone here have a problem switching to terminal windows with edgy?
anyone?
can people here using tty1-4 with edgy?
console doesn't work for me with a clean install of edgy
i can't switch to any tty1-tty6
its a clean install of edgy
dapper worked fine
does it just show a black screen when you try to switch?
well the console doesn't care about the Xorg drivers so that shouldn't matter
ah, ok
ah, of course
but it just shows a black screen, or does the video just die
its not a black screen, just random colors all over the screen
so any ideas?
you can try logging in blindly then typing reset to see if that works
reset would do what?
it resets the terminal sometimes it might work
i figured out the problem
which was?
ah yeah didn't thinking of the framebuffer since I don't mess witht hat usually
i found an easier fix
